hk.ust.cse.comp4321.proj1

Class ForwardIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • hk.ust.cse.comp4321.proj1.rocks.RocksAbstractMap<Integer,V>
      • hk.ust.cse.comp4321.proj1.rocks.RocksIntegerMap<DocumentRecord>
        • hk.ust.cse.comp4321.proj1.ForwardIndex

  • public class ForwardIndex
extends RocksIntegerMap<DocumentRecord>
    The ForwardIndex class represent the forward index table stored in the database which stores the basic details of each document represented by their Document ID

        Insert crawled records to RocksDB document ID lookup table
        Parameters:
        docId - Document ID
        Returns:
        a map that maps the keyword with its frequency
        Throws:
